definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: The crown is decorated with a stunning black onyx cabochon.
sentences.chinese: 錶冠以一顆華麗的凸圓形黑縞瑪瑙裝飾。

sentences.english: Cover marriage gauze originally luxuriant elegance, the bride of set off is more lovely.
sentences.chinese: 本套婚紗華麗典雅，映襯的新娘更加楚楚動人。

sentences.english: They are gorgeously captivating and comparable to that of legendary cruisers, and customized choppers.
sentences.chinese: 他們華麗的迷人和相若的傳奇巡洋艦和定製的摩托車。

sentences.english: The product has the features of translucent, exquisite, pure white and gorgeous.
sentences.chinese: 具有高檔骨瓷的通透，細膩，白潔，華麗品性。

sentences.english: This must be a silk rug，it looks so gorgeous.
sentences.chinese: 這種是絲毯吧？它看上去真是華麗極了。

sentences.english: The invertebrate takes itsname from the equally flashy terrestrial anemone flower.
sentences.chinese: 它和陸地生物銀蓮花一樣，得名於它的華麗。

sentences.english: The most wonderful is Opus 18th the "Great Brilliant Waltz".
sentences.chinese: 最棒的是作品18號，“大華麗圓舞曲”。

sentences.english: In the living room they saw the table covered with antiques and other ornate objects.
sentences.chinese: 在客廳他們看見了古董和其他華麗的物什。

sentences.english: He has not single-handedly elevated anything beyond his own statistics this season, as impressive as they may be.
sentences.chinese: 除了他華麗的數據他沒有單獨提升過任何事。

sentences.english: Walnut has nothing magnificent outside, but possess his fully-fledged brain inside.
sentences.chinese: 沒有華麗的外表，卻有充實的大腦。

sentences.english: Apple is gorgeous but far more sealed and controlled.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果的產品很華麗，但是卻更爲封閉。

sentences.english: Your wedding veil is florid and neat tailored, where did you buy …
sentences.chinese: 你的婚紗華麗又簡潔，哪裏買的？

sentences.english: Rather than flashily smash against the wall, why not elegantly turn a corner? Give yourself the space to make a turnaround.
sentences.chinese: 要華麗撞牆不如優雅轉身，給自己一個迂迴的空間。

sentences.english: If a dog is gorgeous, other dogs don't h ate it.
sentences.chinese: 如果某隻狗打扮得很華麗，其它的狗也不會嫉恨。

sentences.english: Fine clothes added to his strikingly handsome appearance.
sentences.chinese: 華麗的服裝使他那極其英俊的外貌更爲出色。

sentences.english: This is a small budget project so no fancy biddings please.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個很小的預算項目，所以沒有華麗的招標請。
